bilingual.source: She had stitched a picture of her lemon tree onto the purse with shiny thread.
bilingual.target: 她用闪亮的线把她的柠檬树的图案缝在钱包上。
他的车有一个闪亮的轮辋。

bilingual.source: The new car has a shiny surface.
bilingual.target: 新车有一个闪亮的表面。

bilingual.source: The gift was wrapped in shiny paper.
bilingual.target: 这个礼物用闪亮的纸包着。

bilingual.source: The beetle has a shiny, black shell.
bilingual.target: 这只甲虫有一个闪亮的黑色外壳。

bilingual.source: The gabe was wrapped in shiny paper.
bilingual.target: 这个礼物用闪亮的纸包着。

bilingual.source: He lured the fish with a shiny bait.
bilingual.target: 他用闪亮的诱饵引诱鱼上钩。
那个闪亮的苹果看起来很诱人。

bilingual.source: The shiny stars lit up the night sky.
bilingual.target: 闪亮的星星点亮了夜空。
喜鹊喜欢收集闪亮的东西。

list.abstract: shiny，形容词，含义是发光的，光亮的; 闪耀的; 磨亮的; 磨损的。
Shiny 是一个开源的 R 包，它为使用 R 构建 Web 应用提供了一个优雅有力的 Web 框架。Shiny 帮助你在不需要前端知识的条件下将数据分析转变为可交互的 Web 应用。

yingyinNormal.en: The clean tables, the immaculate classrooms, the shiny floors. They don't magically happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干净的桌子，一尘不染的教室，闪亮的地板，这些都不是凭空发生的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's Goldie. You've met her before. She's got a very shiny bowl. What is Goldie like doing? She likes swimming around and going like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他叫做金金，你以前见过他的。他还有一个非常闪亮的鱼缸呢。那金金喜欢做什么事情啊？他喜欢游来游去还喜欢这么做。

yingyinNormal.en: If you put the tooth under your pillow tonight, the Tooth Fairy will come. The Tooth Fairy will take the tooth. And in its place, she will leave a shiny coin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你把牙齿放在你的枕头下面，牙仙子就会来找你，牙仙子会把牙齿拿走，在原来的位置上，她会留下一枚闪亮的金币。

yingyinNormal.en: A nice, shiny dime to add to your collection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给你的收藏中添一枚亮闪闪的硬币。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh. Is it shiny? Pretty shiny. Ooh! And it says "hero" on it? Oh, yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唔 闪金光吗? 挺闪的。唔! 上面还写着"英雄"? 对啊

yingyinNormal.en: George, what are you doing? George is looking at himself in the big shiny mirror. It is very shiny. Come on, George, let's find more shiny things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你在干什么？乔治在这个大大的亮亮的镜子面前看自己。这非常亮。来，乔治，我们多找一些亮亮的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George can see their faces in the shiny spoons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治可以从亮亮的勺子里看懂自己。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a spoon. It's a shiny spoon. Look, I can make you go upside down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个勺子。这是个亮亮的勺子，看，我可以把你的脸弄颠倒。

yingyinNormal.en: What a lovely, shiny car. Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是辆闪闪发亮的好车。没错，洗车这种东西我可是专家。

yingyinNormal.en: What a lovely, shiny car. Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是辆闪闪发亮的好车。没错，洗车这种东西我可是专家。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a mirror, George. Mirrors are shiny, that's why you can see yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一面镜子，乔治。镜子很亮，这就是为什么你能看到自己的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, what's the horsepower on this thing? I don't know, but look how shiny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它的马力多少？不知道，你看它多亮呀！

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, we're looking for shiny things to see ourselves then. Have a look at the spoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，我们正在寻找亮亮的东西来照自己。用勺子照照自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, is there any chance you were looking into a bright, shiny thing called a mirror?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该不会是刚好看到一种叫做镜子的东西吧？

yingyinNormal.en: What shall we play now? Let's have a bicycle race. With a big, shiny cup for the winner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们现在该玩什么呢。我们来比赛骑自行车怎么样。赢了的人就可以得到一个亮闪闪的大奖杯。

yingyinNormal.en: What shall we play now? Let's have a bicycle race. With a big, shiny cup for the winner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们现在该玩什么呢？我们来比赛骑自行车怎么样。赢了的人就可以得到一个亮闪闪的大奖杯。

yingyinNormal.en: Dragon warrior. Oogway? Whoaaa. I can't believe it. Whoa, you're extra shiny. As are you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神龙大侠。乌龟？哇，我不敢相信。哇，你格外耀眼，你也是。

yingyinNormal.en: Do empty carbohydrates count? Pretty much the only thing here that's not shiny happy geeky is Anna.
yingyinNormal.zh: 碳水化合物算不算？我看这里唯一的正常人就是安娜了。

yingyinNormal.en: George has found a muddy puddle. Oh, it shiny enough to see our faces. I can see the sky, there is a cloud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治发现了一个泥坑。哦，这个足够亮，我们可以看到自己的脸。我可以看见天空，那有一朵云。

yingyinNormal.en: How does that work? It's a magic, my daddy says so. Ah, let's find some more magic shiny things in the garden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，这是如何实现的？这是魔法，我爸爸说的。啊，我们去花园多找一些有魔法的亮亮的东西吧。

examination_example.sentence: Today I'm debt-free, resourceful — and I understand that even the <highlight>shiniest</highlight> packaging can't predict what you'll find on the inside.

examination_example.sentence: Companies shift from what is the largest screen size or the <highlight>shiniest</highlight> object and more into what is practical in a consumer's life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司从最大的屏幕尺寸或最闪亮的物体转向消费者生活中实用的东西。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 发光；照耀；擦亮；发亮；反光；照射；出类拔萃；干得出色

examination_example.sentence: I was so excited and I knew as soon as I opened that magical box, my bright, <highlight>shiny</highlight> pogo stick would appear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我非常兴奋，我知道只要我打开那个神奇的盒子，我的亮闪闪的pogo棒就会出现。

examination_example.sentence: Sophie wanted a new scooter because the one in the store was so <highlight>shiny</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索菲想要一辆新的踏板车，因为店里的那辆太亮了。
